metadata.description: Rediscover the underground roots of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles! With hundreds of pages of mutated-martial arts action in each volume, the Ultimate Collections are perfect for fans to relive the glorious days of the Turtles' origins as well as an excellent place for new readers to see where the TMNT phenomena began.
metadata.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Ultimate B&W Collection
